meanings.definition: A member of an ancient sect of naked ascetics in India.
meanings.sent1: The gymnosophist meditated under the tree.
meanings.sent2: The gymnosophist followed a strict lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The gymnosophist surprised everyone by appearing without clothes at the gathering.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to simplicity made her a gymnosophist of modern times.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gymnosophist sitting cross-legged stayed in his mind.

meanings.definition: A person who practices extreme self-discipline and austerity.
meanings.sent1: As a gymnosophist, he refrained from indulging in luxuries.
meanings.sent2: The gymnosophist's dedication to self-control was admirable.
meanings.sent3: The gymnosophist's idea of a treat was a glass of water.
meanings.sent4: In her pursuit of simplicity, she became a gymnosophist of modern times.
meanings.sent5: The gymnosophist's strict routine inspired others to follow suit.
